Printoid Hub is a PREMIUM feature, which allows you to show the status of all your 3D printers at the same time, within the same screen!
The status of all your 3D printers on the same screen!

Welcome to Printoid Hub!

This Premium feature shows you the status of all your configured OctoPrint servers within the same screen, at the same time!

 Please note that the developer is still working on this feature, and it will be enhanced step by step in the future releases.

 Not all information are currently displayed in this screen (such as the camera), but don't worry, it will come in the next versions of the app!
Add one of your OctoPrint profiles or more in this board to see their status!
Your OctoPrint profile \'%s\' is already available in Printoid Hub
Hide the second app icon to start Printoid Hub from your app launcher.\nIf both icons are disappearing, please just restart your phone.
